languages.text: {n}Ксенос задумчиво опускает голову, но ваше внимание привлекает другое движение — едва заметное шевеление пальцев в бронированной перчатке. Создание подает знак кому-то за вашей спиной.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксенос задумчиво опускает голову, но ваше внимание привлекает другое движение — едва заметное шевеление пальцев в бронированной перчатке. Создание подает знак кому-то за вашей спиной.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The xenos lowers his head pensively, but what catches your attention is something else — a barely noticeable twitch of his fingers in his armoured gauntlet. He is signalling to someone standing behind you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос задумчиво опускает голову, но ваше внимание привлекает другое движение — едва заметное шевеление пальцев в бронированной перчатке. Создание подает знак кому-то за вашей спиной.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos lowers his head pensively, but what catches your attention is something else — a barely noticeable movement of his fingers in an armored gauntlet. He is giving a sign to someone — someone behind your back.{/n}

{n}The xenos lowers his head pensively, but what catches your attention is something else — a barely noticeable movement of his fingers in an armored gauntlet. He is giving a sign to someone — someone behind your back.{/n}

{n}The xenos lowers his head pensively, but what catches your attention is something else — a barely noticeable twitch of his fingers in his armoured gauntlet. He is signalling to someone standing behind you.{/n}

{n}The xenos lowers his head pensively, but what catches your attention is something else — a barely noticeable twitch of his fingers in his armoured gauntlet. He is signalling to someone standing behind you.{/n}

{n}The xenos lowers his head pensively, but what catches your attention is something else — a barely noticeable twitch of his fingers in his armoured gauntlet. He is signalling to someone standing behind you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El xenos agacha la cabeza, pensativo, pero hay algo que te llama la atención: un gesto apenas perceptible de los dedos de su guantelete acorazado. Ha enviado una señal a alguien que tienes detrás.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lowers his head pensively, but what catches your attention is something else — a barely noticeable twitch of his fingers in his armoured gauntlet. He is signalling to someone standing behind you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos agacha la cabeza, pensativo, pero hay algo que te llama la atención: un gesto apenas perceptible de los dedos de su guantelete acorazado. Ha enviado una señal a alguien que tienes detrás.{/n}

languages.text: {n}异形深思般地低下了头，但另一件事情引起了你的注意。他装甲护手中的手指微微地抽动着，正在朝你身后的某个人传达着信号。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lowers his head pensively, but what catches your attention is something else — a barely noticeable twitch of his fingers in his armoured gauntlet. He is signalling to someone standing behind you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}异形深思般地低下了头，但另一件事情引起了你的注意。他装甲护手中的手指微微地抽动着，正在朝你身后的某个人传达着信号。{/n}

languages.text: {n}異種族は物思いにふけりながら頭を下げたが、ある奇妙なことに気づいた。彼のガントレットの下にある指がかすかに動いている。こちらの背後にいる何者かに合図を送っているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lowers his head pensively, but what catches your attention is something else — a barely noticeable twitch of his fingers in his armoured gauntlet. He is signalling to someone standing behind you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は物思いにふけりながら頭を下げたが、ある奇妙なことに気づいた――彼のガントレットの下にある指がかすかに動いている。こちらの背後にいる何者かに合図を送っているのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos senkt nachdenklich den Kopf, aber etwas anderes erregt deine Aufmerksamkeit – ein kaum wahrnehmbares Zucken seiner Finger in seinem gepanzerten Handschuh. Er gibt jemandem Zeichen, der hinter dir steht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lowers his head pensively, but what catches your attention is something else — a barely noticeable twitch of his fingers in his armoured gauntlet. He is signalling to someone standing behind you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos senkt nachdenklich den Kopf, aber etwas anderes erregt deine Aufmerksamkeit – ein kaum wahrnehmbares Zucken seiner Finger in seinem gepanzerten Handschuh. Er gibt jemandem Zeichen, der hinter dir steht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le xénos baisse la tête d'un air pensif, mais c'est autre chose qui attire votre attention : un tressaillement presque imperceptible de ses doigts dans son gantelet de métal. Il fait signe à quelqu'un qui se trouve derrière vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lowers his head pensively, but what catches your attention is something else — a barely noticeable twitch of his fingers in his armoured gauntlet. He is signalling to someone standing behind you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos baisse la tête d'un air pensif, mais c'est autre chose qui attire votre attention : un tressaillement presque imperceptible de ses doigts dans son gantelet de métal. Il fait signe à quelqu'un qui se trouve derrière vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zeno, kafasını dalgınca eğerken dikkatini başka bir şey çekiyor. Zenonun eldiveninin içindeki parmaklarının hafifçe hareket ettiğini görüyorsun. Arkanda duran birine işaret yapıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lowers his head pensively, but what catches your attention is something else — a barely noticeable twitch of his fingers in his armoured gauntlet. He is signalling to someone standing behind you.{/n}
